name: Misha Chertkov
content: misha_chertkovSearch this siteEmbedded FilesSkip to main contentSkip to navigationMichael(Misha)Chertkov I was educated in Russia (M.Sc. '90, Novosibirsk State U) and Israel (Ph.D. '96, Weizmann Institute), spent '96-'99 as a Dicke fellow at Princeton U (1996-99) and moved to Los Alamos, NM in 1999, first as an Oppenheimer fellow and then as a staff member in  Theory Division and Center for Nonlinear Studies at Los Alamos National Laboratory (LANL).Relocated to Tucson in 2019, where I am the  Chair of Program in Applied Mathematics at the University of Arizona. This is a personal information web-site.  My UA web-site is here.Google SitesReport abusePage detailsPage updated Google SitesReport abuse
